SELECT B.BUS_NO,B.CHILDREN_NO,B.BUS_YN,B.GET_ON,B.BUS_DATE,B.KINDER_NO,B.CLASS_NO,C.CHILDREN_NAME FROM BUS B JOIN KINDER_CLASS K ON K.CHILDREN_NO = B.CHILDREN_NO JOIN CHILDREN C ON C.CHILDREN_NO = B.CHILDREN_NO WHERE BUS_DATE LIKE #{className}

SELECT B.BUS_NO,B.CHILDREN_NO,B.BUS_YN,B.GET_ON,B.BUS_DATE,B.KINDER_NO,B.CLASS_NO,C.CHILDREN_NAME FROM BUS B JOIN KINDER_CLASS K ON K.CHILDREN_NO = B.CHILDREN_NO JOIN CHILDREN C ON C.CHILDREN_NO = B.CHILDREN_NO WHERE B.BUS_DATE LIKE = #{className} AND B.CHILDREN_NO = #{classNum} AND B.KINDER_NO = 1
